title: REI Co-op Groundbreaker 2 Tent
description: Whether it's your 1st time or your 50th, the 2-person, 3-season REI Co-op Groundbreaker 2 Tent is a no-frills way to get into camping. It's easy to pitch, durable and has ample ventilation.

title: REI Co-op Wonderland 4 Tent
description: Spread out and kick back! The REI Co-op Wonderland 4 tent pitches into a cozy, 3-season basecamp with large doors, 360° views and stable architecture to handle stormy weather.

title: REI Co-op Backpacking Bundle
description: So your friends want to go backpacking ... this weekend. Take the guesswork out of gear shopping with these 3 customer faves—tent, sleeping bag and pad—together in the REI Co-op Backpacking Bundle.

title: Rightline Gear SUV Tent
description: Attaching to the back of any SUV, minivan, wagon or pickup truck with a cap, the Rightline SUV Tent provides room for 6, with 2 in the cargo area and 4 in the fully waterproof tent.

title: Kelty Discovery 2-Person Camp Bundle
description: Helping you and a friend get to your outdoor fun faster, the Kelty Discovery 2-person camp bundle includes a 4-person tent with waterproof fly, 2 cozy sleeping bags and 2 self-inflating sleeping pads.

title: REI Co-op Skyward 4 Tent
description: If you'd like less ducking and crawling and more standing and stretching in your camp life, the REI Co-op Skyward 4 tent is going to make you very happy—and your campground neighbors very jealous.

title: REI Co-op Trail Hut 2 Tent with Footprint
description: Your home on the trail, the 3-season REI Co-op Trail Hut 2 is a dome-shaped happy medium between comfort and cost with easy setup, some storage and a little extra room thanks to the ridge pole.

title: Mountain Summit Gear Campside 3-Person Dome Tent
description: Set up for a weekend with a couple friends in the Mountain Summit Gear Campside 3-Person Dome tent. It sets up quickly and includes plenty of storage for everyone.

title: Mountain Summit Gear Campside 3-Person Dome Tent
description: Set up for a weekend with a couple friends in the Mountain Summit Gear Campside 3-Person Dome tent. It sets up quickly and includes plenty of storage for everyone.

title: REI Co-op Wonderland 6 Tent
description: With 360° views and large awnings, the REI Co-op Wonderland 6 tent pitches into a comfy, 3-season headquarters for fun with a spacious interior that divides into 2 rooms for privacy.

title: Coleman Skydome Darkroom 4-Person Tent
description: With a quick setup that takes less than 5 min. and Dark Room™ technology that blocks 90% of sunlight, the Coleman Dark Room Skydome 4-person tent lets you get right to relaxing anytime of day.

title: REI Co-op Half Dome SL 2+ Tent with Footprint
description: Dropping over a pound from its famed predecessor, the REI Co-op Half Dome SL 2+ backpacking tent is great for two people who appreciate some extra room, intuitive setup and a-spot-for-it-all storage.

title: Coleman Skydome 4-Person Tent
description: With a simple, spacious design that sets up in under 5 min., the Coleman Skydome 4-person tent lets you spend more time relaxing at your campsite and less time messing with gear.

title: REI Co-op Skyward 6 Tent
description: Save crawling into a tiny tent for bivouacs—your basecamp can be a whole lot more comfortable. The cabin-shaped REI Co-op Skyward 6 tent is so roomy, campers up to 6'3" can stand up straight!

title: Marmot Catalyst 3P Tent with Footprint
description: You know that easygoing friend who's always ready for an adventure? That's the Marmot Catalyst 3P tent with an included footprint. Easy to pack, pitch and store, it makes camping a casual affair.

title: The North Face Stormbreak 3 Tent
description: Make new outdoor memories in the roomy The North Face Stormbreak 3. It's a classic 3-person camping tent with ample headroom, plus large doors for easy access and amazing views of the outdoors.

title: Eureka Copper Canyon LX 4-Person Tent
description: With its easy setup, smart features and full standing height, the cabin-style Eureka Copper Canyon LX 4-person tent offers plenty of space for the whole gang to hang out, stretch out and sleep well.

title: The North Face Stormbreak 2 Tent
description: Make new outdoor memories in the roomy The North Face Stormbreak 2. It's a classic 2-person camping tent with ample headroom, plus large doors for easy access and amazing views of the outdoors.

title: Kelty Discovery Basecamp 4 Tent
description: Camping season is calling, and the 4-person Kelty Discovery Basecamp 4 tent makes it easy to answer, setting up easily to serve as your home away from home.

title: REI Co-op Base Camp 6 Tent
description: Combining sturdy geodesic-dome architecture and rugged materials, the mountaineering-inspired REI Co-op Base Camp 6 tent is a roomy and robust campground shelter for 6 people.

title: Kelty Discovery Basecamp 6 Tent
description: Camping season is calling, and the 6-person Kelty Discovery Basecamp 6 tent makes it easy to answer, setting up easily to serve as a home away from home for your whole crew.

title: REI Co-op Trail Hut 2 Tent with Footprint - Print
description: A happy home for the trail, the 3-season REI Co-op Trail Hut 2 is a dome-shaped happy medium between comfort and cost with easy setup, some storage and some extra room thanks to the ridge pole.

title: ust House Party 6 Tent
description: Easy to setup and equipped to sleep 6 comfortably with expandable walls, the spacious ust House Party 6 tent makes any camping trip a fun, fuss-free experience.

title: Marmot Tungsten 4P Tent with Footprint
description: Roomy enough for 4 and easy to set up and adjust, the Marmot Tungsten 4P tent with footprint lets you enjoy the breeze with the top down, then throw on the rainfly when weather threatens.

title: Mountain Hardwear Mineral King 3 Tent with Footprint
description: Spacious enough for car camping, yet light enough for multiday backcountry treks, the Mountain Hardwear Mineral King 3 tent with footprint is ready for adventure no matter where your plans take you.

title: Marmot Catalyst 2P Tent with Footprint
description: You know that easygoing friend who's always ready for an adventure? That's the Marmot Catalyst 2P tent with an included footprint. Easy to pack, pitch and store, it makes camping a casual affair.

title: REI Co-op Flash Air 2 Tent
description: Ounce-counters, meet our lightest 2-person yet: the REI Co-op Flash Air 2 tent. You can pitch it with its own poles—or use your trekking poles—and at under 2 lbs., you barely know it's in your pack.

title: The North Face Wawona 6 Tent
description: Named after an iconic redwood, the refreshed The North Face Wawona 6 tent has gone from single- to double-wall construction. Plus, its huge vestibule makes it feel less like a tent, more like a home.

title: Eureka Copper Canyon LX 8-Person Tent
description: With its smart features, easy setup and near-vertical walls, the cabin-style Eureka Copper Canyon LX 9-person tent offers plenty of space for the whole gang to hang out, stand, stretch and sleep well.

title: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL1 Tent
description: The full-featured, 3-season Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL1 tent just got better with new features inside and out, materials that are stronger and lighter, and hardware that makes setup even easier.

title: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL3 Tent
description: With new features inside and out, materials that are stronger and lighter, and hardware that makes setting up even easier, the Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL3 tent is better than ever.

title: NEMO Dagger OSMO 2P Tent
description: Lightweight, roomy and made with recycled fabric that's PFC- and PFAS-free and uses no fire-retardant chemicals, the 2-person NEMO Dagger OSMO tent raises the experience while lowering the impact.

title: REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL 2 Tent
description: The REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL 2 tent gives you and your backpacking partner real room to sleep. And it's superlight, so you'll never have to rock/paper/scissors to decide who carries it.

title: REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL 2 Tent
description: The REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL 2 tent gives you and your backpacking partner real room to sleep. And it's superlight, so you'll never have to rock/paper/scissors to decide who carries it.

title: NEMO Dagger OSMO 3P Tent
description: Lightweight enough for backpacking, yet roomy enough for comfort when waiting out a storm, the 3-season, 3-person NEMO Dagger OSMO tent is one tent to rule them all for your outdoor adventures.

title: Rightline Gear Full-Size 5.5' Short-Bed Truck Tent
description: Make your campsite anywhere you park your pickup with the Rightline Gear Full-Size 5.5 ft. Short-Bed truck tent, featuring a floorless design that sets up easily, without needing to remove your gear.

title: Outdoor Research Alpine AscentShell Bivy
description: Ideal for alpine pursuits and extreme weather, the Outdoor Research Alpine AscentShell bivy combines the cult-classic Alpine Bivy with Helium AscentShell tech for drastically improved breathability.

title: Snow Peak Alpha Breeze Tent
description: With a design inspired by A-frames and Adirondack cabins, the Snow Peak Alpha Breeze tent features an extended vestibule, convenient entry from all 4 sides and enough living space for 4 people.

title: NEMO Aurora 2P Tent with Footprint
description: With angular patterning reminiscent of mountainscapes, the NEMO Aurora 2P tent with footprint is a versatile and inviting home for adventure—ideal for car camping but light enough for backpacking.

title: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL3 Bikepack Tent
description: Grab your buddies—and your bikes—and hit the trail with the Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL3 Bikepack tent in tow. This redesigned tent is roomier than before, and boasts a lighter, stronger fabrication.

title: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL2 Bikepack Tent
description: Create a home away from home on 2-wheeled adventures with the redesigned Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL2 Bikepack tent. It boasts a roomier interior and a lighter, stronger fabrication than before.

title: REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL 1 Tent
description: Solo backpackers, you no longer have to choose between a light pack and a comfortable night's sleep.The REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL1 tent lets you have both—plus an even lighter summer option.

title: Marmot Tungsten 2P Tent with Footprint
description: A roomy 2-person tent with double doors and vestibules for gear storage, the Marmot Tungsten 2P is quick to set up, thanks to color-coded easy-pitch clips and poles.

title: REI Co-op Adjustable Tarp Pole - Single
description: The single REI Co-op Adjustable Tarp Pole is a handy extendable pole for use with compatible awnings, tarps and shelters. Get the length that suits your gear!

title: REI Co-op Flash Air 1 Tent
description: Bikepackers, light packers and peak baggers, meet our lightest 1-person yet: the REI Co-op Flash Air 1 tent. You can pitch it with its own poles—or your trekking pole—and weighs only 1 lb. 4 oz.

title: REI Co-op Flash Air 1 Tent
description: Bikepackers, light packers and peak baggers, meet our lightest 1-person yet: the REI Co-op Flash Air 1 tent. You can pitch it with its own poles—or your trekking pole—and weighs only 1 lb. 4 oz.

title: Big Agnes Tiger Wall UL 3 Solution-Dyed Tent
description: With its lightweight design, single-pole system and 2 vestibules to enter and exit efficiently, the Big Agnes Tiger Wall UL 3 Solution-Dyed tent elevates your backcountry camping experience.

title: REI Co-op Screen House Shelter
description: Don't let the bugs get you down! The REI Co-op Screen House floorless shelter offers bug and shade protection, great ventilation and 360° views.

title: The North Face Wawona 4 Tent
description: Named after an iconic redwood, the refreshed The North Face Wawona 4 tent has gone from single- to double-wall construction. Plus, its huge vestibule makes it feel less like a tent, more like a home.

title: Caddis Rapid Shelter - 10' x 10'
description: This heavy-duty shelter sets up easily and adjusts to 3 different peak heights to protect you from the rain and sun during backyard activities, camping, picnics, beach outings and outdoor events.

title: NEMO Aurora Highrise 6P Tent
description: With a spacious, standing-height design, simple setup and vibrant colors, the 6-person NEMO Aurora Highrise 6P tent extends joy to camping adventures with family or friends.

title: Marmot Tungsten 3P Tent with Footprint
description: A roomy 3-person tent with double doors and vestibules for gear storage, the Marmot Tungsten 3P is quick to set up, thanks to color-coded easy-pitch clips and poles.

title: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL2 Footprint
description: The Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL2 footprint shields the floor of your Copper Spur HV UL2—or Copper Spur HV UL2 mtnGLO—tent from the wear and tear of the campsite.

title: Caddis Rapid 4 Tent
description: Spend less time setting up camp and more time enjoying the great outdoors. The easy-to-set-up Caddis Rapid 4 tent boasts a roomy interior that comfortably fits 4 and stores all your camp essentials.

title: MSR Hubba Hubba 3 Tent
description: Redesigned and lighter than ever, the MSR Hubba Hubba 3 tent won't force you to compromise between comfort and weight. It's roomy, breathable and symmetrical for easy setup in a flash.

title: Eureka Copper Canyon LX 6-Person Tent
description: With its easy setup, smart features and near-vertical walls, the cabin-style Eureka Copper Canyon LX 6-person tent offers plenty of space for the whole gang to hang out, stand, stretch and sleep well.

title: Rightline Gear SUV Tailgating Canopy
description: Get a little shade or hide away from the rain the next time you tailgate with the Rightline Gear SUV Tailgating canopy, an easy-to-install design with weighted sandbags to resist windy conditions.

title: Gazelle T4 Hub Tent
description: With a pop-up design for easy setup, the Gazelle T4 Hub 4-person tent boasts a peak height of 78 in. for standing room and freedom of movement, plus plenty of windows for enjoying the view.

title: REI Co-op Trailbreak Tarp - 12 x 12
description: Lightweight and versatile, the 12 x 12 REI Co-op Trailbreak tarp keeps your camp and gear protected from the elements, offers plenty of pitching options and has gear loops so you can hang a light.

title: Big Agnes Fly Creek HV UL2 Solution-Dyed Bikepack Tent
description: Lighter, stronger and thoughtfully made, the 3-season Big Agnes Fly Creek HV UL2 Solution-Dyed bikepack tent is built for efficient 2-wheeled travel on- and off-road.

title: Big Agnes Tiger Wall 3 Carbon Tent
description: The Big Agnes Tiger Wall 3 carbon tent is an ultralight traveler's dream. Made with Dyneema® fabric and Easton carbon fiber poles, it's lightweight yet durable and packs up small.

title: Kelty Waypoint Car Tarp
description: When the weather comes in, the Kelty Waypoint car tarp comes out, attaching to your vehicle and supported by a simple 1-pole design that keeps you sheltered from the rain or shaded from the sun.

title: NEMO Aurora Highrise 4P Tent
description: With a spacious, standing-height design, simple setup and vibrant colors, the 4-person NEMO Aurora Highrise 4P tent extends joy to camping adventures with family or friends.

title: Marmot Limelight 3P Tent with Footprint
description: Your spacious home away from home, the 3-person Marmot Limelight 3P tent features zone pre-bend construction that creates vertical walls for a roomy sleeping area and greater head room.

title: Thule Basin Tent
description: Meet the ultimate hybrid system that combines a rooftop tent and cargo carrier in one. The Thule Basin auto-deploys as a rooftop tent, and doubles as a cargo carrier so you can bring all the toys.

title: Kelty Wireless 6 Tent
description: Sometimes you have to disconnect to connect. Get ready to leave it all behind with the 6-person Kelty Wireless tent, which sets up lightnin' fast and ensures maximum connection—to nature, that is.

title: Coleman Skydome Darkroom 6-Person Tent
description: With a quick setup that takes less than 5 min. and Dark Room™ technology that blocks 90% of sunlight, the Coleman Dark Room Skydome 6-person tent lets you get right to relaxing anytime of day.

title: Kelty Blockhouse Privacy Shelter
description: The Kelty Blockhouse privacy shelter creates an ideal out-of-sight space for a camp toilet (sold separately), changing clothes, or showering off after a long hike.

title: Kelty Discovery H2GO Privacy Shelter
description: A little privacy goes a long way. That's why the free-standing, easy-setup Kelty Discovery H2GO privacy shelter does double duty as a shower and privacy shelter.

title: MSR Ground Hog Stake
description: This sturdy aluminum tent stake is nearly indestructible.

title: Coleman Skydome 6-Person Tent
description: Spend more time enjoying your campsite and having fun with the family with the simple, spacious Coleman Skydome 6-person tent—it sets up in under 5 minutes.

title: NEMO Dragonfly 3 Tent
description: The NEMO Dragonfly 3 tent is an ultralight, freestanding tent that offers plenty of livability for 3 backpackers, with trapezoidal vestibules for ample storage that doesn't obstruct entry.

title: Snow Peak Amenity Dome M Tent
description: A luxurious tent for car camping with the entire family, the Snow Peak Amenity Dome M tent fits 4 people and sets up easily so you can spend more time playing and less time wrestling with a tent.

title: Coleman PEAK1 4-Person Dome Tent
description: An excellent option for campers looking to get out no matter the weather, the Coleman PEAK1 4-person dome tent is spacious, rugged and built to stand up to wind and rain.

title: ENO Guardian Bug Net
description: Rest peacefully in your hammock without the bother of bugs with this ENO Guardian bug net.

title: Big Agnes Fly Creek HV UL 2 Solution-Dyed Tent
description: Experience the redesigned, solution-dyed, roomy Big Agnes Fly Creek HV UL SD 2 tent. It delivers more livable space while you're adventuring off the grid thanks to its steep-wall architecture.

title: Kelty Backroads Shelter
description: Whether you're looking for protection from the elements, a place to party or simply more space to call home, the easy-setup Kelty Backroads Shelter will revamp your camping game.

title: MSR Remote 2 Tent
description: A strong, 4-season refuge for 2 mountaineers, the MSR Remote 2 tent offers the protection you need with the livability that keeps you levelheaded for days or weeks in the harsh alpine.

title: NEMO Wagontop 6 Tent
description: With a unique pole structure that provides generous interior space and room to stand up and stretch, the NEMO Wagontop 6 tent is luxury camping embodied—perfect for families or groups of friends.

title: Neso 1 Sunshade
description: Don't let wind or hard ground ruin your shade. The Neso 1 sunshade is a lightweight, portable sun shelter with stakeless anchors that you fill with sand or rocks, great for the beach or soccer field.

title: Big Agnes Battle Mountain 3 Tent
description: Offering full protection in the harshest of backcountry and high-alpine conditions, the Big Agnes Battle Mountain 3 tent is a spacious, lightweight 4-season mountaineering shelter.

title: Snow Peak Vault Dome Tent
description: A luxurious choice for car camping with family or friends, the Snow Peak Vault Dome tent's spacious interior and vestibule provide amble space for 4 people to sleep and gather.

title: MSR Habitude 4 Tent
description: From family river trips to the kids' first climbing adventure, the MSR Habitude 4 tent features a standing-height interior that makes it easy to change clothes and navigate piles of gear.

title: Sea to Summit Alto TR2 Tent
description: With nearly vertical walls that deliver expansive views and extensive livability, the two-person Sea to Summit Alto TR 2 tent is a highly ventilated, 2-door wonder weighing under 3 lbs.

title: Neso Party Tent
description: Easy and fast to set up by just one person, yet roomy enough to fit all your friends, the large Neso Party tent lets you and your group enjoy shade at the beach or in a backyard.

title: Kelty Noah's Tarp
description: An essential adventure piece, Noah's Tarp from Kelty helps you kick back in any weather. Throw it up to stay shady while mixing up camp cocktails, playing cards or planning the next day's route.

title: NEMO Dagger 2 Footprint
description: Gravelly and sharp surfaces can take a toll on your tent's floor and longevity. Protect the bottom of your tent with the durable NEMO Dagger 2 footprint.

title: REI Co-op Trail Hut 4 Tent with Footprint
description: It's a happy medium between comfort and cost that'll quickly become your family's home on the trail. The REI Co-op Trail Hut 4 is easy to set up and has a little extra room thanks to the ridge pole.

title: REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL Tarp
description: Configurable for days, the square shape of the REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL tarp is ideal for lightweight backpackers. Pitch it low and tight for stormy days or high and open for views and ventilation.

title: Eureka Space Camp 4-Person Tent
description: Offering 3-season comfort for families and groups, the Eureka Space Camp 4-person tent features generous height, a large floor area and an Air Exchange System for fully adjustable airflow.
